joinMessage:
- About Limited Time Servant -
Oda Nobunaga will only join for the duration of the event "GUDAGUDA Honnoji."
By gaining a certain number of "Event Points" through event quests, she will officially join your party.
Details for Event Points can be checked in the "Event Rewards" screen which opens with the button at the top right of the Terminal.
getMessage:
- About Limited Time Servant -
Oda Nobunaga has officially joined.
She will remain as a Servant
after the event as a result.
Further acquisition of Honnoji Points
will grant you additional copies of Oda Nobunaga.
Please confirm the details from the Event Points
Rewards listings.
leaveMessage:
- About Limited Time Servant -
Oda Nobunaga did not meet the requirement to officially
join your party by the end of the event and has departed.
The Craft Essence equipped on Oda Nobunaga
will automatically be removed.

joinMessage:
- About Limited Time Servant -
Ryougi Shiki will join only for the duration of the event "the Garden of sinners/the Garden of Order."
By completing missions within the event, she will officially join your party.
Details for missions can be checked in the Event Rewards screen which opens with the button at the top right of the Terminal.
getMessage:
- About Limited Time Servant -
Ryougi Shiki has officially joined your party.
As a result, she will remain as a Servant after the event.
Further completion of missions will grant you additional copies of Ryougi Shiki.
Please confirm the mission details on the Event Rewards screen.
leaveMessage:
- About Limited Time Servant -
The requirements for Ryougi Shiki to officially join your party were not meet and she has departed.
The Craft Essence equipped on Ryougi Shiki will automatically be removed.

joinMessage:
- About Limited Time Servants -
Sakata Kintoki [Rider] will join your party
only for the duration of the event
"The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima."
By clearing a certain quest within the event,
he will officially join your party.
getMessage:
- About Limited Time Servants -
Sakata Kintoki [Rider] has officially joined your party.
As a result, he will remain as a Servant after the event.
Further trading with the items acquired during the event will grant you additional copies of Sakata Kintoki [Rider].
leaveMessage:
- Limited Time Servant Withdrawal -
The requirements for Sakata Kintoki [Rider] to officially join your party were not met and he has departed.
The Craft Essence equipped to Sakata Kintoki
[Rider] will be removed automatically.

joinMessage:
- About Limited Time Servant -
Scáthach (Assassin) will join your party only for the duration of the event "Summer! Ocean! Pioneering! FGO Summer 2018."
She will officially join your party by completing Part 2 of the main quest.
getMessage:
- About Limited Time Servant -
Scáthach (Assassin) has officially joined your party.
As a result, she will remain as a Servant after the event.
Further trading with the items acquired during the event will grant you additional copies of Scáthach (Assassin).
leaveMessage:
- About Limited Time Servant Withdrawal -
The requirements for Scáthach (Assassin) to officially join your party were not met by the end of the event and she has departed.
The Craft Essence equipped on Scáthach (Assassin) will be removed automatically.

joinMessage:
- About Limited Time Servant Additions -
Jeanne d'Arc Alter Santa Lily
will join your party only for the duration of the event "The Little Santa Alter - Christmas 2018".
By trading a certain item obtained through the event, she will officially join your party.
getMessage:
- About Limited Time Servants Officially Joining -
Jeanne d'Arc Alter Santa Lily has officially joined your party. As a result, she will remain as a Servant after the event.
Furthermore, trading additional event items will grant you additional copies of Jeanne d'Arc Alter Santa Lily.
leaveMessage:
- About Limited Time Servants Departing -
The requirements for Jeanne d'Arc Alter Santa Lily to officially join your party were not met by the end of the event and she has departed.
The Craft Essence equipped to Jeanne d'Arc Alter Santa Lily will be removed automatically.
Also, if a certain requirement has been met, 
you can trade in a "Silver Exchange Ticket" by 20:59, 12/05 to have her officially join your party.

getMessage:
- About Limited Time Servants Officially Joining -
Jeanne d'Arc Alter Santa Lily has officially joined your party. As a result, she will remain as a Servant after the event.
Furthermore, trading additional event items will grant you additional copies of Jeanne d'Arc Alter Santa Lily.
leaveMessage:
- About Limited Time Servant's Departure -
The requirements for Jeanne d'Arc Alter Santa Lily to officially join your party were not met by the end of the event and she has departed.
The Craft Essence equipped to Jeanne d'Arc Alter Santa Lily will be removed automatically.
If the requirements have been met, you can exchange the "Silver Exchange Ticket" by 11-27 19:59 PST to have her officially join your party.
